code: import _classCallCheck from"@babel/runtime/helpers/classCallCheck";import{Bounce,TweenMax}from'gsap';import{CubeGeometry,Group,Mesh,MeshPhongMaterial}from'three';var Water=function Water(){var _this=this;_classCallCheck(this,Water);this.run=function(){var explosionSpeed=0.3;var removeParticle=function removeParticle(p){p.visible=false;};for(var i=0;i<_this.parts.length;i++){var tx=-1.0+Math.random()*1.0;var ty=Math.random()*2.0+1;var tz=-1.0+Math.random()*1.0;var p=_this.parts[i];var bezier={type:'cubic',values:[{x:0,y:0,z:0},{x:tx,y:ty,z:tz},{x:tx*0.8,y:ty*0.8,z:tz*0.8},{x:tx*(Math.random()*0.5+1.1),y:0,z:tz*(Math.random()*0.5+1.1)}],curviness:0};p.position.set(0,0,0);p.scale.set(1,1,1);p.visible=true;var s=explosionSpeed+Math.random()*0.5;TweenMax.to(p.position,s*4,{bezier:bezier,ease:Bounce.easeOut});var scaleTo=0.01;TweenMax.to(p.scale,s,{x:scaleTo,y:scaleTo,z:scaleTo,onComplete:removeParticle,onCompleteParams:[p],delay:s*3});}};this.waterMat=new MeshPhongMaterial({color:0x71d7ff,flatShading:true});this.mesh=new Group();var size=0.2;var bigParticleGeom=new CubeGeometry(size,size+0.1,size,1);this.parts=[];for(var i=0;i<15;i++){var partPink=new Mesh(bigParticleGeom,this.waterMat);this.parts.push(partPink);this.mesh.add(partPink);}};export{Water as default};
